modShortDescription: Texture pack port of Stay True 1.20 version
modDescription:
Texture pack that attempts to port the Stay True texture pack to MC3DS. Some textures may be missing, but when the Vanilla Default 1.20 pack is complete a merge will be made since Stay True (the version used for this port) is intended for version 1.20. 

Original Texture Pack:
https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/stay-true-4447380/ 
or...
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/stay-true 

Made by:
HaiMcFly (Planet Minecraft)
url: https://www.planetminecraft.com/member/haimcfly/ 
haimcyfly (CurseForge)
url:

Ported by: STBUniverse

Known bugs:
Changing the colormap for the grass makes that the texture of the grass block side could have the wrong color
